programmes.show_description: It's a Switch Special! Get over 35% off cardstock, plus 30% off all Switch tools and accessories - everything you need to create, craft, and customise your projects with ease.
Something old, something new, something elegant that's just for you - the Sara Signature Antique Lace collection brings true heirloom beauty to all your projects.
There's no place like home! Craft your own, charming house-shaped cards and bring a smile all year round with the Seasonal House Dies collection.
Cute enough to brighten anyone's day, the Vertical Edge Stamp & Dies collection brings fun and endless creativity to your papercraft creations.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
Join Adam Brooks for an extra hour of Sewing Street as the Birthday celebrations continue!
Rebecca Harrison will be back with a brand new pattern from Needle In Hand, the Edie Dress.
Lisa Lam joins us on the last day of Birthday with a gorgeous new bag pattern - The Next Big Sling Bag.
Rebecca Harrison is back with another brand new pattern the Rosie Sleeveless Wrap, and brings back the sell out Jane Jacket!
Lisa Lam brings another brand new pattern to Sewing Street - The Well Rounded Duffle Bag.
As our 6th Birthday comes to an end, we take a look back at some of our favourite highlights!
Discover Janie's Originals Book Making Kits, Print Packs, Bookbinding Slope Tool, and more - everything you need to craft fun and unique projects from start to finish!
For the love of Stamps is Hunkydory's award winning collection of high quality, clear polymer stamps. Tune in with Cat for the latest launch - splendid scrapbooking.
Hailing from Nottinghamshire, the Dreamees always bring pretty projects and beautiful designs but always within everyone's budget. Tune in to find out why they are so popular.
Add texture to your cards and projects with ease using Moonstone Embossing Folders by Hunkydory. Join Cat for the latest launch - Stylish Patterns!
Discover Janie's Originals Book Making Kits, Print Packs, Bookbinding Slope Tool, and more - everything you need to craft fun and unique projects from start to finish!
Join Cat for the latest Pocket Pads & Frames. Easily create truly cute card designs for all sorts of occasions with these super handy Pocket Pads.
Hailing from Nottinghamshire, the Dreamees always bring pretty projects and beautiful designs but always within everyone's budget. Tune in to find out why they are so popular.
The ground-breaking and market leading Adorable Scorable cardstock is back with A Touch of Colour, featuring a gorgeous selection of pastel colours!

HobbyMaker Repeats.
Crochet Society brings together beautifully curated projects, premium yarns, and exclusive patterns - perfect for creating thoughtful handmade presents for every occasion.
This bright and colourful Riley Blake Quilt is a perfect summer addition to your home, demonstrated by Becky Alexander-Frost.
Explore richly textured and beautifully patterned tapestry fabrics, perfect for upholstery, bags, cushions, and statement projects that need a touch of classic style and depth.
Becky Alexander-Frost is back for her second hour with her best selling Mini Project Case and Sycamore Bag, in new colourways and panels available.
We're finishing off the show today with an hour of Birthday quilts and kits!
NEW to HobbyMaker! An exciting creative collaboration with Sizzix featuring a range of nature inspired stamps, stencils and mixed-media tools. It's time to awaken the artist.
Emlems is back with a selection of Silicone Mould Sets featuring matching craft papers and pre-cut ephemera.
NEW to HobbyMaker! An exciting creative collaboration with Sizzix featuring a range of nature inspired stamps, stencils and mixed-media tools. It's time to awaken the artist.
Enjoy a crafty hour with Leona and exclusive deals on MDF Kits and stencils.

Step into the Sweet Factory for a feast of crafty goodies - from vibrant vinyls to colourful cardstock and more!
